Rulings.Edison:
● This card can only search "Red Gadget". It can't search "Future Fusion".
● If this card is Summoned as chain link 2 or higher, its effect misses its timing, and can't activate.
You can read more about Timing here:
https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/missing-the-timing
Rulings.Tengu:
● This card can only search "Red Gadget". It cannot search "Future Fusion".
● If this card is Summoned as chain link 2 or higher, its effect misses its timing, and cannot activate.
You can read more about Timing here:
https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/missing-the-timing

Rulings.Base: 1. If "Green Gadget" is Special Summoned by "Giant Rat", its effect can be activated.

PSCT.Edison: ① When Normal/Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Red Gadget" from your Deck to your hand.
